Title: Set off a new upsurge in studying the writings of Marx, Lenin and Chairman Mao
Publisher: Shandong renmin chubanshe (山东人民出版社)
Notes: A soldier, cadre, peasant and worker studying books by Marx and Engels, Lenin and (most prominently) Mao, with Mao hovering in the background as a radiant sun. This poster was published just two months after Mao's passing away.
